title: I NEED A FUCKING EXPLANATION RIGHT FUCKING NOW

replies.body: Riot doesn't manually pair people up in matches, that'd take waaaaaay too much manpower. If you're playing normals, your rank isn't taken into account as much as your general MMR. If people are afking on you, smash that report button in the post game lobby and let us deal with 'em bud!

so LOOK AT MY LAST 8 GAMES EXPLAIN TO ME WHY I HAVE GOTTEN A RAGER OR AFKER IN EVERY" GAME TO THROW? NON STOP R U FUCKING SERIOUS THIS IS PAST DUE U NEED TO FORCE OR MANUALLY PUT ME WITH BETTER PLAYERS THIS IS FUCKING GUT WRENCHING GARBAGE WASTE OF TIME
LOOK AT THE AMOUNT OF CONTROL WARDS PLACED AND KILL PARTICIPATION WARDS UPGRADED TO SCANNER! CHECK ALL THAT FUCKING SHIT

out of 6 games i have 4 games with a 2.0kda or higher and ive lost 5 r u fucking serious? like how can i win with unfair teams i am taking out 3 more champs then me per game but my teammates cant keep up r u sure you aint matching players with kda?
feel as if i get teammates below 1 kda and the enemy gets those 3.3 kda players

its preventing me from climbing more then 50% of games i have a afker or rage quiter so i dont know how ppl can climb 4v5 especially constantly being paired in a 4 v 5 and my mmr might be silver 4 but i out play silver 2's all day, i have 2 silver 2 friends surprised i deranked so muich especially since they only play normals unless i play ranked, and they always do worse then me, so it isnt just a glitch or a cocidence, the game quality is poor. Thanks for the report and REALLY THANKS FOR THE RESPONSE I WAS RAGE FEST TILT FEST YESTERDAY BUT HONESTLY THESE GAMES are 0 percent fair ITS NEVER THE ENEMY THAT AFKS ALWAYS MY TEAM
Please help me my game is not loading , my laptop is a lenevo intel core 3 plslspls help ðŸ˜­ðŸ˜¢

THATS ALL I FUCKING GET IS FUCKING AFK AFK AFK
